text:
i love this track!!! kinda has a jungle beat to it lol, paired with the peaceful melody i found this really relaxing.....conjures up visions of a cyber utopian paradise. expect more great music from DUO, yasuhisa watanbe really kills it in the next game!

i also liked "grey lips," "wanted true pasta," "north star," and "sentimental journey" from the first game.
